item.title: Organon Co 10-K
item.description: Organon Co, which is in the Pharmaceutical Preparations [2834] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 21, 2022 had 42360 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: organon - 681 instances 2021 - 423 instances organon’s - 409 instances products - 395 instances merck - 333 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
